item.title: The Things I Use
item.description: Getting closer to how your environment actualy works will only expand your mind â€” Michael B. Paulson, otherwise known as ThePrimeagen This page was last edited on March 29, 2024 My former college roomate and good friend, Hayden Buscher, recently made a post about the things he uses to stay productive. Giving credit where its due, I thought it was a great idea, so I decided to give my own spin on it.
